original_text: Thy seed also had been as the sand, and the offspring of thy bowels like the gravel thereof; his name should not have been cut off nor destroyed from before me.
korean_text: 네 자손이 모래 같았겠고 네 몸의 소생이 모래 알 같아서 그의 이름이 내 앞에서 끊어지지 아니하였겠고 없어지지 아니하였으리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Thy seed also had been as the sand
sentences.korean_translation: 네 자손 또한 모래와 같았을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the offspring of thy bowels like the gravel thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 네 몸에서 난 자손은 그것의 자갈과 같았을 것

sentences.original_text: his name should not have been cut off
